name: jinora
description: jinora is a public chat application for a slack team that lets anonymous users talk to the entire team.

ORGANIZATION_NAME.description: A name of the organization which will be displayed in the webpage

SESSION_SECRET.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies

API_TOKEN.description: Generate one for your team at api.slack.com/web

BUFFER_SIZE.description: Number of messages to keep in memory

SLACK_CHANNEL.description: Name of public channel in slack

BASE_URL.description: Base url of the deployed application

ADMIN_NICK.description: How to display the name of an admin. full for the full name, nick for the nickname (default)
